definitions.definition: Panthera pardus , a large wild cat with a spotted coat native to Africa and Asia , especially the male of the species (in contrast to leopardess ).
A similar - looking , large wild cat named after the leopard.

subdefinitions.definition: A clouded leopard (either Neofelis nebulosa or Neofelis diardi ), a large wild cat native to Asia .
The snow leopard ( Panthera uncia ), a large wild cat native to Asia .

definitions.definition: Any of various nymphalid butterflies of the genus Phalanta , having black markings on an orange base.

main_definition: Panthera pardus , a large wild cat with a spotted coat native to Africa and Asia , especially the male of the species (in contrast to leopardess ).
secondary_definitions: ( inexact ) A similar - looking , large wild cat named after the leopard.
Any of various nymphalid butterflies of the genus Phalanta , having black markings on an orange base.
